metadata.title: CVE-2021-47079 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:platform/x86: ideapad-laptop: fix a NULL pointer dereference The thirdparameter of dytc_cql_command should not be NULL since it will bedereferenced immediately.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
